results.title: Antidiabetic drug metformin disrupts the embryogenesis in zebrafish through an oxidative stress mechanism.
results.text_hl: Antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ disrupts the embryogenesis in @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ through an oxidative stress mechanism.

citations.NLM: Elizalde-Velázquez GA, Gómez-Oliván LM, García-Medina S, Islas-Flores H, Hernández-Navarro MD, Galar-Martínez M. Antidiabetic drug metformin disrupts the embryogenesis in zebrafish through an oxidative stress mechanism. Chemosphere. 2021 Dec;285():131213. PMID: 34246938
citations.BibTeX: @article{34246938, title={Antidiabetic drug metformin disrupts the embryogenesis in zebrafish through an oxidative stress mechanism.}, author={Elizalde-Velázquez GA and Gómez-Oliván LM and García-Medina S and Islas-Flores H and Hernández-Navarro MD and Galar-Martínez M}, journal={Chemosphere}, volume={285}, pages={131213}}

results.title: BNC1 deficiency induces mitochondrial dysfunction-triggered spermatogonia apoptosis through the CREB/SIRT1/FOXO3 pathway: the therapeutic potential of nicotinamide riboside and metformin.
results.text_hl: Our data establish that oral @CHEMICAL_nicotinamide_beta_riboside @CHEMICAL_MESH:C018613 @@@nicotinamide riboside@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be useful for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Male_Infertility_with_Large_Headed_Multiflagellar_Polyploid_Spermatozoa</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562903 @@@spermatogenic failure@@@ induced by @GENE_BNC1 @GENE_12173 @@@Bnc1@@@ mutation.

citations.NLM: Ni F, Wang F, Li J, Liu Y, Sun X, Chen J, Li J, Zhang Y, Jin J, Ye X, Tu M, Chen J, Chen C, Zhang D. BNC1 deficiency induces mitochondrial dysfunction-triggered spermatogonia apoptosis through the CREB/SIRT1/FOXO3 pathway: the therapeutic potential of nicotinamide riboside and metformin. Biol Reprod. 2023 Dec 11;():. PMID: 38079523
